titleInfo.title: Memphis Prep School Championship Boxing Team, 1931

mods.abstract: The Christian Brothers Boxing Team posed for photo: Front Row (L-R): Unknown, Unknown, Unknown, Joe Hartz, Theobald. Second Row (L-R): Coach Milo Solomito, Garland Liles, Breen Bland, Ralph Turley, Vince Tuminello, Jack Barry, PeeWee Chandler, William Whitman. Third Row (L-R): Matt Dwyer, Unknown, Ed Turk, Fred Pendergast, Jim Mahon, John Toma, Jimmy McWillie, Lloyd Higgins. Some of the boys were wearing CBC belt buckles.
